```json
{
  "application": "MPI",
  "details": {
    "software": [
      "libfabric",
      "PrgEnv-gnu-amd",
      "Cray PE-Accel AMD GFX90A",
      "ROCm",
      "MPI",
      "libTree",
      "HIP",
      "CUDA",
      "AddressSanitizer",
      "ThreadSanitizer"
    ],
    "resources": {
      "nodes": 2,
      "tasks_per_node": 1,
      "cpus_per_task": 16,
      "gpus_per_task": 1,
      "partition": "standard-g",
      "time": "06:00:00",
      "account": "project_465000723",
      "scratch_dir": "/scratch/project_465000723/tgillis/rmem_${TAG}_${SLURM_JOBID}"
    },
    "environment_variables": [
      "HIPCC_COMPILE_FLAGS_APPEND",
      "HIPCC_LINK_FLAGS_APPEND",
      "ASAN_OPTIONS",
      "TSAN_OPTIONS",
      "FI_HMEM_CUDA_USE_GDRCOPY",
      "FI_CXI_OPTIMIZED_MRS",
      "FI_LOG_LEVEL",
      "FI_CXI_RDZV_THRESHOLD",
      "HYDRA_TOPO_DEBUG",
      "PMI_DIR",
      "OFI_DIR",
      "OFI_LIB",
      "FI_CXI_DISABLE_NON_INJECT_MSG_IDC",
      "USE_HIP",
      "RMEM_OPT"
    ],
    "other": {
      "mpi_options": "-n 2 -ppn 1 -l --bind-to core:2",
      "make_targets": [
        "info asan",
        "info verbose",
        "info fast"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```
